about_the_game:
NEW HOLLAND LOADER PACK
Users who bought Farming Simulator 15 base game on Steam already own this DLC automatically.
Extend your gaming experience with this official extension for Farming Simulator 15!
This free DLC contains two new vehicles from New Holland:
  • New Holland W170C Wheel loader
  • New Holland LM 7.42 Telehandler

Once downloaded, the additional content will be available in the in-game shop. Be sure to have sufficient in-game funds to buy the machinery.

This DLC is compatible with the Windows and Mac OS X versions of Farming Simulator 15 (version 1.2.1 or more).

You will find these vehicles in the "Mods" section of the shop (After the Brand section).

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7.1, 10.8.1, 10.9.1, 10.10.1
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel or equal AMD-Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB OF VIDEO MEMORY ATI RADEON HD 2600/NVIDIA GEFORCE 8600 OR HIGHER
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR THE ONLINE GAME
